sources.name: rawDataParquet
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~>  rawDataParquet

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared rawDataParquet = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://ssattirajudemorgstg.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/parquet/PS_20174392719_1491204439457_log.parquet"),
  Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc),
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Parquet, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Promoted headers", each [type] = "PAYMENT"),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"nameOrig", "step", "type", "amount", "oldbalanceOrg", "newbalanceOrig", "nameDest", "oldbalanceDest", "newbalanceDest", "isFraud", "isFlaggedFraud"}),
  #"Pivoted column" = Table.Pivot(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Reordered columns", {{"nameOrig", type text}}), List.Distinct(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Reordered columns", {{"nameOrig", type text}})[nameOrig]), "nameOrig", "nameOrig")
in
  #"Pivoted column";
